title:
A numerical method to simulate the stochastic linear-quadratic optimal
  control problem with control constraint in higher dimensions
abstract:
We propose an {\em implementable} numerical scheme for the discretization of
linear-quadratic optimal control problems involving SDEs in higher dimensions
with {\em control constraint}. For time discretization, we employ the implicit
Euler scheme, deriving discrete optimality conditions that involve time
discretization of a backward stochastic differential equations. We develop a
recursive formula to compute conditional expectations in the time
discretization of the BSDE whose computation otherwise is the most
computationally demanding step. Additionally, we present the error analysis for
the rate of convergence. We provide numerical examples to demonstrate the
efficiency of our scheme in higher dimensions.
